mapper.insert: INSERT INTO soccer_match(club1_score, club2_score, soccer_match_recruitment_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (0, 0, #{soccerMatchRecruitmentId}, now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.club1_score, a.club2_score, a.soccer_match_recruitment_id, a.created_at, a.updated_at FROM soccer_match a INNER JOIN soccer_match_recruitment b ON a.soccer_match_recruitmnet_id = b.id WHERE (b.club2_id =! null) AND (b.club1_id = {clubId} OR b.club2_id = {clubId})
